title: 103_s1249
content: Tuberculosis Prevention and Control Amendments of 1993 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize appropriations for: (1) the prevention, control, and elimination of tuberculosis. (2) research, demonstration projects, public information, and education concerning the prevention, control, and elimination of tuberculosis. And (3) research relating to tuberculosis through the National Institute on Allergy and Infectious Diseases. Amends the Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to authorize appropriations for a tuberculosis drug and device research program.
